00083 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEALLNAMES 1
00084 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEBANLIST (1 << 1)
00085 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEWHOLIST (1 << 2)
00086 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEBANEXCEPTIONLIST (1 << 3)
00087 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEINVITELIST (1 << 4)
00088 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEQUIETBANLIST (1 << 5)
00089 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_DEADCHAN (1 << 6)
00090 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTBANLISTREQUEST (1 << 7)
00091 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTBANEXCEPTIONLISTREQUEST (1 << 8)
00092 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTINVITELISTREQUEST (1 << 9)
00093 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTQUIETBANLISTREQUEST (1 << 10)
00094 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTWHOREQUEST (1 << 11)
00095 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTPART (1 << 12)
00096 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SYNCHRONIZED (1 << 13)
00097 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_NOCLOSEONPART (1 << 14)
00098 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTSYNCWHOREQUEST (1 << 15)

00134 typedef struct _KviChannelAction
00135 {
00136         QString      szNick;       // action source nick
00137         unsigned int uActionType;  // type of the action
00138         kvi_time_t   tTime;        // time of the action
00139         int          iTemperature; // temperature of the action
00140 } KviChannelAction;
00141 
00147 typedef struct _KviChannelActivityStats
00148 {
00149         unsigned int        uActionCount;              // number of actions in the history
00150         bool                bStatsInaccurate;          // the stats are inaccurate because we have just joined the chan
00151         unsigned int        uLastActionTimeSpan;       // the timespan between the last action and now
00152         unsigned int        uFirstActionTimeSpan;      // the time span between the first and the last action
00153         double              dActionsPerMinute;         // average number of actions per minute in the lastActionTimeSpan
00154         unsigned int        uActionsInTheLastMinute;   // number of actions in the last minute
00155         int                 iAverageActionTemperature; // the average chan temperature
00156         unsigned int        uHotActionCount;
00157         unsigned int        uHotActionPercent;
00158         QStringList         lTalkingUsers;             // users that seem to be talking NOW
00159         QStringList         lWereTalkingUsers;
00160 } KviChannelActivityStats;
